item.title: Newbie Tax Traps
item.description: Taxes! Something you learn on the field often after it’s too late. Here are some things I wish someone told me. ⚠️Disclaimer: These are just words cooked up from my head and not definitive or exact. More like recalling stories from personal experience. The details I’ll leave it to you and google or CA. 1) Reporting your mid FY job change TL;DR report your previous employer as soon as you join new company
